summary: This Armor was designed for the Ashath Map Mod
descriptionHtml:
Medieval Knight Armor for Ashath
by stormshallow

This Armor was designed for the Ashath Map Mod

The Forum Advertizement:
http://forums.nexusm...ashath-map-mod/

but as we do not have enough help with the project and are wanting to continue with other things we are releasing it for other people to play with. Enjoy.

 


Install:
   Copy Textures folder, Meshes folder, and MedievalKnightArmor.esp into you data folder.



All items can be found in a barrel at the Skyforge in Whiterun.



You can also use the \"command line\" to get them.

Type: Help MKnight

type: player.additem (item code) 1


There are also 5 armored horses just outside Whiterun


Credits:
	All items textured or retextured by Stormshallow,
but the only meshes that I molded are the weapons.

Resources used:

   Armor:
   Witcher 2 Style Dawnguard and Standard Heavy Plate by Baraban
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22602//?

   The Witcher 2 Models by LordOfWar
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5588//?

   Dragon Priests Armor by Backsteppo
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6537//?

   Shield:
   A Steel Heater Shield by Abakus
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5916/?

   Black Sleeveless Shirt:
   Black Clothing by Zombie007
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17511//?

   Fine shirts:
   Historical Revival - The Roman Era by Jedo Dre and the team
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32988//?

   Executioner clothing:
   Thieves Guild and Nightingale Sleeveless Armor by QuickFox
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8461/?

   Masked orc helmet:
   Masked Helmets by VefTheVef
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19880//?

   Horse Armors for Skyrim by Mystikhybrid - Gabriel Gullbergh
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13348/?
author: stormshallow
